arts.ttl: Roma vs Inter Milan: Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Click here for the latest in Sports News from around the world brought to you by LiveScore. We cover the most up to date Sports stories in unmissable detail.

arts.ttl: Cristian Chivu: “Every Match Is A Final” For Inter Milan Ahead Of Roma Clash & Adds Update On France Star’s Recovery
arts.sum: After the international break, Cristian Chivu and Inter Milan face their first major test back in action – a trip to the Stadio Olimpico to meet Roma, one of Serie A’s in-form sides and home to the league’s best defence, with the Romanian discussing his side’s opposition and other topics, including an update on injured […] The post Cristian Chivu: “Every Match Is A Final” For Inter Milan Ahead Of Roma Clash & Adds Update On France Star’s Recovery appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: “Cristian Chivu Has Given Inter A New Identity” – Roma Boss Praises Nerazzurri Coach Ahead Of Serie A Clash

arts.ttl: “Roma Was A Wonderful Chapter Of My Life” – Cristian Chivu Reflects Ahead Of Inter Milan Trip To The Stadio Olimpico
arts.sum: On the eve of Roma vs Inter, Cristian Chivu spoke to Sky Sport about his team’s mindset, Gasperini’s influence, and the emotions of returning to the Stadio Olimpico, a ground tied to his own playing past. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Midfielder’s Future Still Unclear As Roma Clash Rekindles Kone Link
arts.sum: Saturday’s clash between Roma and Inter Milan brings an intriguing subplot involving Davide Frattesi and Manu Kone, two midfielders who could easily have swapped sides last summer. arts.ttl: Inter Milan One Goal Away From Record-Breaking 300th Serie A Strike Against Roma
arts.sum: Inter Milan stand on the brink of another historic milestone ahead of their trip to the Stadio Olimpico against Roma this weekend. According to Opta, via FCInterNews, the Nerazzurri have scored 299 Serie A goals against Roma. Therefore, just one more would make them the first team in Italian top-flight history to reach 300 goals […] The post Inter Milan One Goal Away From Record-Breaking 300th Serie A Strike Against Roma appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: Inter Milan Face Major Attacking Decision Vs Roma: “French Signing Favoured Over Italian Starlet”
arts.sum: Cristian Chivu faces a key attacking dilemma ahead of Inter Milan’s trip to Roma, with Marcus Thuram almost certain to miss out through injury and Ange-Yoan Bonny tipped to stay in the XI. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Midfielder Tops Serie A For Long-Range Goals: Level With Roma & Juventus Stars
arts.sum: Since arriving at Inter in 2021, Hakan Calhanoglu has established himself as one of the most dangerous long-range shooters in Serie A. arts.ttl: Inter Milan’s Tactical Plan For Roma: “Unpredictable Even Without Thuram”
arts.sum: As Cristian Chivu and his Inter Milan prepare to face Roma, La Gazzetta dello Sport broke down the tactical battle ahead – one that pits two evolving teams against each other. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Without Three Players For Roma Clash As Argentina Star Returns & New Boy Set To Start
arts.sum: Inter will travel to the capital without Marcus Thuram, Matteo Darmian, and Filippo Di Gennaro for their Serie A clash against Roma. This comes as the Corriere dello Sport reports. Thuram remains out with a thigh injury, targeting a return against Napoli on October 25.
